A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extremely excited that risks were taken. Star Wars is my number one fandom\, and I'm enjoying where the new trilogy is taking us. Would call out specific scenes\, but will not spoil anything. Links to other films\, including Rogue One\, tie all the movies together beautifully. The force works in mysterious ways\, and personally don't feel that every force power has been discovered or used yet. Looking forward to future installments!!
